title: ICAI Launches Essential Practitioner's Guide on Modified Auditor's Reports
content:
# ICAI Launches Essential Practitioner's Guide on Modified Auditor's Reports

Ek important update hai for all Chartered Accountants! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne ek naya aur bahut useful publication announce kiya hai.

ICAI ke Auditing and Assurance Standards Board (AASB) ne "Practitioner's Guide on Drafting of Modified Opinions in Independent Auditor's Reports" ka February 2026 edition release kar diya hai.

*   **What it is:** This guide is designed to help auditors effectively draft modified opinions in their independent auditor's reports.
*   **Why it's important:** It provides practical guidance, including illustrative examples and suggested language for qualified opinions, adverse opinions, and disclaimers of opinion, all in consonance with the Standards on Auditing. This will surely enhance clarity and consistency in reporting modified opinions.
*   **Benefit:** This publication aims to be extremely beneficial for our members and other stakeholders in their professional work.
